name: Pirates Deck
description: Pirates Deck is Tower Defense Game, Save your Island Base from enemy Pirates.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP Processor: Cor 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: THIS GAME WILL ONLY RUN ON 32bit ARCHITECTURE, DOES NOT SUPPORT 64bit ARCHITECTURE

reviews.review_text: I actually installed this JUST to review it because people deserve to be warned!  Another wonderful scam brought to you by another wannabe dev. The game was greenlight as a Tower Defence game but apparently the dev didn't care so he released this broken pos space shooter instead , completely abusing and exploiting Greenlight.  The game is an abomination. Almost unplayable and broken in its controls. There is nothing to do in it. Its nothing but 1 stage in a dome about 100 yds across. Total scam. Avoid at all costs. And report it to Valve so it is rightfully removed.

Wow, i played this game for 6 minutes. You cant enjoy this. I mean, BOATS OVER LAND? Like wtf.  Pros: -Can't think of any pros Cons: -Boats over land? -No abillity to upgrade/replace/remove turrets. -It's a bunch of waiting. Not actually doing anything  I don't enjoy this game...
